participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, Emily is always ready to lend a hand to those in need. She's passionate about her job and enjoys spending quality time with her family.
participant_1.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and introspective, Liam enjoys exploring nature and reflecting on his experiences. He is somewhat shy but opens up to those he trusts.
participant_2.background: i have a pet fish. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. my favorite color is orange.
